document_title: Amoebic dysentery: Symptoms, causes, diagnosis, treatment and prevention
subsection_name: ly-amip.json_4_Who is at risk of amoebic dysentery?
subsection_content:
Anyone can get amoebic dysentery, however, the following people are often at higher risk: (3)
People who have traveled to tropical areas with unsanitary conditions; Immigrants and tourists from tropical regions have unsanitary conditions; People living in areas with poor sanitation; Men who have sex with men; Anal sex
